trans-unit.resname: P2HG·1 | Underworld Dreams | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever an opponent draws a card, CARDNAME deals 1 damage to that player.
trans-unit.target: Whenever an opponent draws a card, CARDNAME deals 1 damage to that player.

trans-unit.source: "In the drowsy dark cave of the mind, dreams build their nest with fragments dropped from day's caravan."\n—Rabindranath Tagore
trans-unit.target: "In the drowsy dark cave of the mind, dreams build their nest with fragments dropped from day's caravan."\n—Rabindranath Tagore
